snippet: The Mostly Mozart festival this week features George Benjamin’s opera “Written on Skin” as well as performances of Bach, Beethoven and Mendelssohn.
lead_paragraph: The Mostly Mozart festival this week features George Benjamin’s opera “Written on Skin” as well as performances of Bach, Beethoven and Mendelssohn.

headline.print_headline: Classical; Mozart Pitches a Big Tent
headline.main: Mostly Mozart’s Big Tent Embraces George Benjamin, Dai Fujikura and More
